Articles.Content:
Hello,

this might be a stupid question but i'm new to KSP, and i'm having a problem running kerbal engineer redux, for some reason, it does not work (not all the time though)

http://i.imgur.com/qKcdsyz.png

and sometimes it does work, depending on the rocket.

is there any reason why this is happening?

Welcome to the forums

I suspect you are playing career mode. KER supports career mode, in the sense that you need to fulfill certain requirements to get the readout during flight, such as having an engineer Kerbal present onboard, adding a certain part to the rocket, or others. You can customize what exactly applies to you in your current game (or even set it to always-on) in the Settings tab of the KER window when you are in the editor. (You might want to ask in the KER mod thread what each setting means if you find it confusing.)

1 hour ago, Streetwind said:

Welcome to the forums

KER supports career mode, in the sense that you need to fulfill certain requirements to get the readout during flight, such as having an engineer Kerbal present onboard, adding a certain part to the rocket, or others. You can customize what exactly applies to you in your current game (or even set it to always-on) in the Settings tab of the KER window when you are in the editor. (You might want to ask in the KER mod thread what each setting means if you find it confusing.)

Thanks a lot! now its working properly
